cause.description:
UNCG is in the final push in it's capital campaign to raise money for students. That's why it is called the Students First Capital Campaign.
$100 million is being raised to fund scholarships, professorships, research and service, and learning environmental needs.
At 80% to goal, the University Advancement division needs your help. Start leaving your legacy at your Alma Mater.
If you want more information or do not feel comfortable giving money here, please follow the link below:
http://www.uncg.edu/dur/campaign/
1. The campaign's definitive focus is to create a life-changing collegiate experience for our students.
2. Excellent resources and competitive salaries recruit outstanding faculty who attract and inspire outstanding students.
3. An exceptional atmosphere for teaching, learning and uniting with our community enriches the university experience.
4. The greater our research enterprise, the stronger partner UNCG can be in enhancing the quality of life and economic environment of our community.
cause.mission: Raise funds for the advancement of student and alumni initiatives.
cause.name: Support for UNC Greensboro
